Package com.ooyala.cast

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CastEventBusCommunicator
    CastEventBusCommunicator provides capability to communicate with Custom Receiver via custom message bus.
    CastManager
    CastManager is singleton.
    CastPlayer
    Control the playback e.g.
    RemoteMediaClientListener
    Workaround to let correct update states of minicontroller and notification
    UpdateImageViewRunnable
    Update the ImageView's image based on a url
